MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell affecting properties in Lomond Walk and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault, due to the complexity of the work required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 4pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.40am on Friday 23rd October 2020.
